```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv("responses.csv")
glimpse(df)
```
```{r}
filtered_df <- df %>% filter(!slider_copout)
```


```{r}
model <- lmer(slider_value_normed ~ agent_is_subject + (1|item_id) + (1|uniqueid),
              data=filtered_df)
summary(model)
```
```{r}
ranef(model)
```
